data.title: Bitcoin tumbles below $40,000 to lowest since September as investors dump risky assets
data.description: The price of bitcoin fell to its lowest point since September as rising rates continue leading investors to shed positions in risky, growth-oriented assets.

data.title: Why inflation can actually be good for everyday Americans and bad for rich people
